Download Your Mods

This page will show you which mods to download for Ultimate Skyrim.

Approximate Time: Long AF

 

Approximate Filesize for Complete Installation: 65gb

The Ultimate Skyrim Modlist makes it easy to download and install your mods.

 

Here's an example mod from the list:

  1. Mod Title/Author: The mod's title, author, and version number.
  2. File Name/Category: The name and category of the file you're looking to download.
  3. Mod Description: A brief description of the mod. Read this section carefully!
  4. Required Flag: This stripe indicates if a mod is REQUIRED or OPTIONAL.                            (The mod in this example is OPTIONAL.)
  5. Performance: Shows the mod's performance impact: LOW, MEDIUM, or HIGH.                (The mod in this example is LOW.)
  6. Additional Installation: Contains any additional instructions, like FOMOD installers.
  7. Download Button: Click this button to visit the mod's download page.

Let's get started! Download and install each mod in the order listed below.

To locate individual mods, "find" them with Ctrl+F.

 

Please remember to endorse these mods and support the Mod Authors,

without whom Ultimate Skyrim would not exist.

 

WARNING: Do not Merge any files during installation.
If Mod Organizer asks you to Merge/Replace/Rename, always Rename.

Also, remember to Activate mods as you install them by checking the box!

 

Strap in buckaroo - you'll be here a while. Good luck!

by: LoRd KoRn
  Main Files:
  • AOS 2.5.1 Full Installer
AOS adjusts nearly everything about Skyrim's sound experience. It introduces new effects, replaces many lackluster sound files, adjusts each sound's audible distance, and more.

Sound is paramount to staying alive in Requiem's harsh environment, and AOS makes it easier to hear important audible queues like traps, enemy attacks, enemy idles, etc.
